alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 9:09PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Isle of Wight, northeastern Southampton, east central Sussex and south central Surry Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 908 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Homeville, or near Waverly, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Smithfield, Windsor, Wakefield, Isle Of Wight, Ivor, Zuni, Booth Fork, Pons, Berlin, Bethel Church, Ellis Fork, Manry, Littleton, Central Hill, Whitley, Dory, Comet and Raynor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Isle of Wight; Southampton; Surry; Sussex
